attributes.additional_details: Alan Bates has forced the government to act on the Post Office Horizon scandal. The country is now angry and wants urgent action, which the governmenthas now been forced to take. Post masters and mistresses have been treated disgracefully. We need people like Alan in the Lords.
attributes.background: Offer Alan Bates a Lord for his outstanding national campaign.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments. This includes requests for peerages.

You can find out how people are appointed to the House of Lords here: https://www.parliament.uk/about/mps-and-lords/about-lords/lords-appointment/
